title: Icon in the Making - Danielle Brooks - 55th NAACP Image Awards (Video Clip) | BET
text: Icon in the Making - Danielle Brooks 03/14/2024 Danielle Brooks's raw acting talent and colorful personality have helped her earn acclaim from her performances on "Orange Is the New Black" and in "The Color Purple."
